definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

pinyin: gao1 tie3 xue4 hong2 dan4 bai2

sentences.english: Heme , the prosthetic group of the hemoglobin, has been used widely and importantly.
sentences.chinese: 血红素是血红蛋白的辅基，有极其广泛和重要的应用。

sentences.english: Iron deficiency can cause anaemia resulting from low levels of haemoglobin in the blood.
sentences.chinese: 缺铁可导致贫血导致低水平的血红蛋白在血液中。

sentences.english: Over 300 000 babies with severe haemoglobin disorders are born each year.
sentences.chinese: 每年有30多万新生儿患有严重的血红蛋白疾患。

sentences.english: Over-exposure to NF3via inhalation induces the conversion of hemoglobin to methemoglobin .
sentences.chinese: 过量吸入NF3会导致血色素转化成高铁血红蛋白。

sentences.english: Iron stores in the body become depleted and haemoglobin synthesis is inhibited.
sentences.chinese: 铁店在体内成为枯竭和血红蛋白合成受到抑制。

sentences.english: The only known hemoglobinopathy of animals is porphyria.
sentences.chinese: 动物中唯一已知的血红蛋白病是卟啉症。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the causes of hemoglobinuria after open heart operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨体外循环过程中引起血红蛋白尿的原因。

sentences.english: When Hb reach the peak value, the curve of anaerobic limen moves left and there is an increase of aerobic ability.
sentences.chinese: 血红蛋白高峰时，无氧阈曲线右移，有氧能力提高。

sentences.english: Hemolytic anemia, hemoglobinuria, jaundice & mucous membrane petechiation.
sentences.chinese: 溶血性贫血，血红蛋白尿，黄疸，粘膜有瘀点。

sentences.english: The preparation of meat flavor by enzyme hydrolyzed pig haemoglobin was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了酶法水解猪血红蛋白制备肉味香精的工艺。

sentences.english: Please wait for the result of your hemoglobin test.
sentences.chinese: 请等一下你的血红蛋白化验结果。

sentences.english: It is Bright red when combined with oxygen and purple-Blue in the deoxygenated state.
sentences.chinese: 血红蛋白与氧结合后呈鲜红色，缺氧时呈紫蓝色。
导致血红蛋白疾患的原因是什么？

sentences.english: The primary end point was the change from the baseline glycated hemoglobin level.
sentences.chinese: 主要终点是糖化血红蛋白水平较基线时的变化。

sentences.english: The liver, it seemed, was not breaking up the hemoglobin to bile pigment.
sentences.chinese: 看来肝并没有把血红蛋白分解成胆色素。

definition: hematin (blood pigment)/heme/hemoglobin/also written 血紅蛋白|血红蛋白

pinyin: gao1 tie3 xue4 hong2 dan4 bai2

definition: choline esterase (ChE), hydrolyzing enzyme in blood plasma
neutrophil (the most common type of white blood cell)
